Date: Monday, 5/5/1987
Subject: Progress of William Escalante
Dear Sir,
William Escalante is hitting the ball well at A Bolton Wilberts!
He has an AVG of .362, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/14/1987
Subject: Status of Constantino Crespo
Dear Sir,
Constantino Crespo shouldn't play at AA Scituate Somersets!
He has an AVG of .247 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
